ProductInfo.Features:
Includes 2 1.3MP cameras with Infra Red Cut Filter (ICR) function and powerful night vision to 60ft for indoor/outdoor use
4 Channel HD record and playback surveillance NVR。
Stream Live Video Directly to a remote MAC or PC, iPhone, iPad, or Android. Receive email alerts with Snapshot upon motion detection。
Includes 2 100ft pre-made RJ45 CAT5e cables。
Free DDNS to use。
ProductInfo.Name: Insmartec In-KN3942R IP Security System 4 Channel NVR with 2 1.3 Megapixel 720P IP Camera Outdoor Security Dome Cameras IR Night Vision and 500 GB Hard Drive Surveillance CCTV Camera System (White)
